issue.title: spawning the PR2 robot VS inserting the PR2 robot

content.raw: I haven't tried reproducing the issue, but it looks to me like it could be an issue finding the meshes for the PR2. My guess comes from the fact that your screenshot shows a white box, but no other visuals. You can try right-clicking the model and choosing to visualize collisions, since they are simple shapes, they should show up.
content.html: I haven't tried reproducing the issue, but it looks to me like it could be an issue finding the meshes for the PR2. My guess comes from the fact that your screenshot shows a white box, but no other visuals. You can try right-clicking the model and choosing to visualize collisions, since they are simple shapes, they should show up.
